name: jocularity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being happy and liking to make jokes: There's a kind of forced jocularity to his writing. She is known for jocularity in her dealings with the press. See
jocular
More examplesFewer examplesHer air of warm jocularity masked her fundamental emotional coolness.The coach gave everyone a kind word or a bit of jocularity.Thankfully, the group kept jocularity to a minimum.
